contents.text: Thank you for calling Swiftly, based in San Francisco and dedicated to improving transit efficiency and reliability worldwide.
If you are an existing transit agency client, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve the real-time vehicle tracking errors on our Swiftly dashboard before morning service
I need help fixing our agency’s real-time bus tracking display for the veteran shuttle routes.
I need help debugging the API integration for your real-time vehicle tracking feed.
I need technical support for our real-time bus tracking dashboard.
I’m getting errors integrating your real-time tracking API for my campus transit project and need technical support.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Update our billing contact and review last month's charges for our transit account
I want to review last month’s invoice and apply the nonprofit veteran discount to our account.
I have questions about this month’s invoice and service usage overage charges.
I need help reviewing and paying our latest Swiftly invoice.
I’d like to update our agency’s billing information and obtain an invoice for last month’s subscription.

contents.text: If you are interested in new city or transit agency partnerships, press 2.
For partnership information and demos, press 1.
One moment please while we transfer you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Arrange a partnership demo of Swiftly's performance analytics for our city's transit team
I’d like to schedule a demo of your transit management platform for a new veteran shuttle partnership.
I’d like to schedule a technical demo of your predictive arrival-time and dispatch optimization module.
I’d like to schedule a partnership demo for our city’s transit department.
I’m interested in exploring a partnership and would like to schedule a demo of your transit optimization platform.

contents.text: For general information about our services, press 2.
One moment please while we connect you to our customer information desk.

navigationGoals: Get a concise overview of Swiftly's services and partnership process for new transit clients
I’m looking for an overview of your services to see how they can support a veteran-focused transit program.
I’m evaluating transit optimization platforms and need an overview of your core service offerings.
I want general information about Swiftly’s transit improvement services.
I want to learn more about your services and how they can improve reliability for a municipal transit system.
